title: HOUR 3- David Carr Sep 23, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- David Carr Sep 23, 2020
description:
David Carr says that he still sweats bullets watching his brother Derek play for the Las Vegas Raiders. David tells Dan that his brother Derek has not listened to him since he was 14 years old.
